content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Group at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x1) with coal inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with coal inserted

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available and not busy before inserting items. Check the status of the furnace to confirm it can accept more materials.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract from the furnace only when it has finished processing items. Check the furnace's output to avoid unnecessary extraction attempts.

### Errors when updating inventory
- Regularly check the inventory after significant actions to ensure that the inventory reflects the current state accurately. This helps in tracking resources effectively.
